title: Credit Card Help
body:
Is it safe to purchase rp with credit card?
That's my question riot?

replies.body: I'm not sure what you mean.  Your credit card information is as safe as your security practices.  You can store your info on the client to purchase RP, but you don't have to save it.  I recommend reviewing the [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide for some solid safety practices to keep your info safe in and outside of league!
